title: Three Treasures of Justification
theme: Peace with God, Access to Grace, and Hope That Does Not Disappoint
summary: Comprehensive prayer points based on Bishop Johnson's sermon on justification. Includes 7 specific prayers covering the three treasures of justification, practical applications, and bold witness.
actionSteps: Read one Bible passage daily on justification
Share the gospel with one person this week
Write a testimony about what justification means
Pray for someone struggling with guilt
Thank God for His righteousness given to you
Study the doctrine of justification deeper

title: The Gospel of Grace - Peace with God
theme: Peace with God Through Jesus Christ
summary: Based on the powerful sermon about Jesus as the Peace Child who legally secured our peace with God. Includes 8 prayer points covering our legal standing, God being FOR us, transformation through grace, and evangelistic passion.
keyPoints: God is FOR us, not against us
Treated as though we never left home
Nothing can separate us from God's love
actionSteps: Declare 'It is God who justifies!' when condemned
Thank God daily that He treats you as He treats Jesus
Allow grace to teach you to say 'no' to ungodly habits
